mapper.sql: id, name, res_key, url, description, is_menu, parent_id, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT p.id,p.name,p.res_key,p.url,p.description,p.is_menu,p.parent_id,p.create_time,p.update_time FROM sys_privilage p LEFT JOIN sys_role_privilage rp ON p.id=rp.privilage_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rp.role_id=ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_admin u ON ur.user_id=u.id WHERE u.id=#{userId}

SELECT p.id,p.name,p.res_key,p.url,p.description,p.is_menu,p.parent_id,p.create_time,p.update_time, cp.id cid,cp.name cname,cp.res_key cres_key,cp.url curl,cp.description cdescription, cp.is_menu cis_menu,cp.parent_id cparent_id,cp.create_time ccreate_time,cp.update_time cupdate_time FROM sys_role_privilage rp LEFT JOIN sys_privilage p ON rp.privilage_id=p.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ctp.id,ctp.name,ctp.res_key,ctp.url,ctp.description,ctp.is_menu,ctp.parent_id,ctp.create_time,ctp.update_time FROM sys_role_privilage crp LEFT JOIN sys_privilage ctp ON crp.privilage_id=ctp.id WHERE crp.role_id=#{roleId} ) cp ON p.id=cp.parent_id WHERE rp.role_id=#{roleId} AND p.is_menu=1 AND p.parent_id='0'

SELECT p.id,p.name,p.res_key,p.url,p.description,p.is_menu,p.parent_id,p.create_time,p.update_time, cp.id cid,cp.name cname,cp.res_key cres_key,cp.url curl,cp.description cdescription, cp.is_menu cis_menu,cp.parent_id cparent_id,cp.create_time ccreate_time,cp.update_time cupdate_time FROM sys_privilage p LEFT JOIN sys_privilage cp ON p.id=cp.parent_id WHERE p.parent_id='0'
